alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 17 at 12:21AM CST until December 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Portions of western Arkansas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
